idea:
M/s The Bombay Churros (TBC) was incorporated on 28th June 2017 as a Registered Partnership Firm, having partners Mr. Nitesh Oza, Mr. Punit Ghadge and Mr. Nikkhil Borkar. Being dessert lovers and passionate foodies, the trio decided to break the cliches and started The Bombay Churros. Their love for trying gave birth to the idea of bringing the Spanish dessert to Bombay. 

Being the first stand alone store for Churros, The Bombay Churros is their baby.

Taking desserts a notch higher, every ingredient is tested personally and then made into this crunchy delicious dessert. The concept of loop indicates that every customer is bound to visit infinite (∞) times to try their lavish spread of Churros. Aiming to offer a pocket friendly yet extraordinary dessert experience is what the brand aims at.

Being localites in the city of Mumbai, TBC has planned to acquire a strong base in the city in consideration of which the Brand has been named after the city (Bombay i.e. Mumbai).

The first outlet of TBC began its operations on 25th August 2017.
name: THE BOMBAY CHURROS

idea: ​​Hands On Therapy Concepts provids quality rehabilitation services to clients with activity limitation & participation restriction. We are involved in treating clients as well as training professionals for the recent trends in rehabilitation.
